sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
There are 80 members on a student council in a school and the ratio of the number of boys to the number of girls is \(5 : 3 \). How many more girls should be added to the council so that the ratio of number of boys to the girls become \(25 : 24 \).
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{Sum of the terms of the ratio is $ = 5 + \input[s1v1]{} = 8 $}$$"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{So, number of boys in the council is}$$ 
\[
	= \frac{5 }{\input[s2v1]{} } \times 80 = 50.0 
\] "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{So, the number of girls in the council is}$$
\[
	= \frac{3 }{8 } \times 80 = \input[s3v1]{}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{Let $x$ be the number of girls that should be added to the student council. Now, number of girls is $ = 30.0 + x $}$$"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{So, according to given information, we can write that}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{30.0 + x } = \frac{25 }{24 }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[\Rightarrow 1200.0 = \input[s6v1]{} + 25 x\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	\Rightarrow \input[s7v1]{} = 25 x
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	\Rightarrow x = \input[s8v1]{} 
\]
$$\text{This is the number of girls that needs to be added.}$$"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [3], "text": "$$\text{Sum of the terms of the ratio is the sum of the two parts of the ratio, i.e., $5 + 3 = 8$}$$"}, {"data": [8], "text": "$$\text{We know that the ratio of boys to girls in the council is $5 : 3$.Therefore, the fraction of boys in the council is $3 / (5 + 3)$.}$$"}, {"data": [30.0], "text": "$$\text{The ratio of boys to girls in the council is $5 : 3$.Similarly, the fraction of girls in the council is $5 / (5 + 3)$.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{After adding $x$ girls, the total number of girls in the council will be $30.0 + x$.}$$"}, {"data": [50.0], "text": "$$\text{According to the problem, the ratio of boys to girls in the council will remain the same after adding $x$ girls. Therefore, we can set up an equation}$$ $
	\frac{50.0 }{30.0 + x } = \frac{25 }{24 } $ $$\text{using the ratios before and after adding $x$ girls.}$$"}, {"data": [750.0], "text": "$$\text{Cross-multiplying the fractions and simplifying, we get $1200.0 = 750.0 + 25 x $ } $$"}, {"data": [450.0], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplifying the equation, we get $450.0 = 25 x $}$$ "}, {"data": [18], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification we get the value of $x = 18$.}$$"}]
